subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After allowing a leadoff home run to Coco Crisp, the Tigers’ Justin Verlander shut down Oakland through seven innings of a 3-1 win in Game 1 of an American League division series.
snippet: After allowing a leadoff home run to Coco Crisp, the Tigers’ Justin Verlander shut down Oakland through seven innings of a 3-1 win in Game 1 of an American League division series.
